text: Wu Chengzhang or Woo Cheng-Chang (born 7 May 1924) is a Chinese basketball player. He competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. Wu was part of the China basketball team, which finished 18th in the Olympic tournament.1948 Chinese basketball player revisits London, BBC, 4 August 2012 Afterwrads, Wu returned to China, where he played and coached basketball in his hometown of Shanghai until he retired. Wu is one of China's last remaining 1948 Olympians. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for China Category:Chinese basketball players
title: Wu Chengzhang
